name: market for fish canning plant | fish canning plant | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18758/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'fish canning plant', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of  fish canning plant. The activity of the plant also includes fish pre-processing and it is expressed as the installed capacity required to process 1000 kg of raw material. The infrastructrure has a  production capacity of 7,673 kg and a lifespan of 40 years. The process includes all the building materials for the construction and maintenance of the plant.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects

exchanges.description: One unit of plant represents the installed capacity required to process 1 t of raw material
